QuestData.Title: Investigate the Broken Shore
QuestData.Description: All of us know the price we paid the last time we set foot upon the Broken Shore.$b$b<Skylord Omnuron turns his eyes to the ground.>$b$bI recommend dispatching a scouting team to investigate the Legion's strength. We need to know what we're facing in that accursed place.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Scouting Map and complete the mission, "Menace on the Broken Shore".

Objectives.Objective: "Menace on the Broken Shore" mission completed
